text:
Nothing yet! We are prioritizing a different sections feature first before section fields, but fields are still very much on the list for us! If anyone here is interested in sections that don't have DnD areas in them, feel free to DM me, we're not too far from needing beta testers!

We're currently building "fixed layout" sections, where you'd have static modules inside the section, but you wouldn't need to have DnD syntax inside the section itself. However, the section would still appear in the add module sidebar for the marketer and could be dragged dropped anywhere regular sections could be dragged and dropped.
:bulb: Anyone else down for a module “settings” tab – similar to styles tab? Settings currently have that awkward “do i put this in contents tab or styles tab?” conundrum
great idea, but HubSpot would first have to solve how to move settings to a different tab without breaking for existing users
Same way they did for styles tab!

Would be nice if all of the fields were available to each of the tabs too. I get that they want to make stylistic things be on styles, but sometimes it just doesn’t work, such as when you have a repeater and want to give each item different style options.
Dustin's suggestion would resolve the issue I mentioned, sorry that wasn't clear.
